text.en: Actual embodiment of all the victorious ones of the three times,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwa malü düpé ngö

text.en: Omnipresent lord of all buddha families, nirmāṇakāya Mañjunātha,
text.en-trans: rik kün khyabdak jamgön trulpé ku

text.en: I pray to you from the depth of my heart: inspire me with your blessings!
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jingyi lob

text.en: Cause renunciation and bodhicitta to arise in my stream of being,
text.en-trans: ngejung changsem gyü la kyewa dang

text.en: And through transmitting the great blessing of your wisdom intent,
text.en-trans: tukgyü gongpé jin chen powa lé

text.en: Cause the realization of Mahāmudrā, my own genuine awareness,
To arise authentically, just as it is, within my mind!
In this life, the next, and all the phases of the intermediate state,
text.en-trans: di chi bardö nekab tamché du

text.en: May I be guided and cared for by you, Gentle Lord and Wish-Fulfilling Gem,
And having become inseparable from your secret body, speech and mind,
text.en-trans: sangwa sum dang yermé gyur né kyang

text.en: May the twofold benefit of myself and others be spontaneously accomplished!
text.en-trans: rangzhen dön nyi lhün gyi drubpar shok
